column2: (let ((orig (default-value 'buffer-read-only))) (unwind-protect (progn (setq-default buffer-read-only t) (with-temp-buffer (kill-new "a") (kill-new "b") (yank) (setq last-command 'yank) (condition-case err (progn (yank-pop 1) (buffer-string)) (error (car err))))) (setq-default buffer-read-only orig)))
